structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.catch_line: Department for Libraries and Archives -- Commissioner.
law.text: The Department for Libraries and Archives is established. The department shall be headed by a commissioner whose title shall be state librarian who shall be appointed by and serve at the pleasure of the Governor, and who shall have had technical training in the field of library science.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 381, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 127, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. VIII, sec. 2. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 41, sec. 1.
